titleStmt.title: The representation of Colonell Inglesby's regiment in the garrison of Oxford, in the behalfe of our selves and all the Nation, Sept. 7. 1649. directed to all the souldiers of the Army, and to the whole nation

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; date of publication from caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
